content: end of round 88 96 sts round 14 *k6 p2 sm repeat from * to end of round 2 maine cables hat © 2019 heather anderson round 15 *k4 k2tog p2tog sm repeat from * to end of round 66 72 sts round 16 *k5 p1 sm repeat from * to end of round round 17 *k3 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end of round 55 60 sts round 18 *k4 p1 sm repeat from * to end of round round 19 *k2 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end of round 44 48 sts round 20 *k1 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end of round 33 36 sts round 21 *k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end of round 22 24 sts round 22 k2tog all around 11 12 sts finishing cut the yarn and draw the tail through the remaining stitches on the needle pull tight and secure weave in all ends abbreviations & techniques 3/3 lc = slip 3 stitches to cable needle and hold at the front of the work knit 3 stitches from the left needle and then knit 3 stitches from the cable needle 3/3 rc = slip 3 stitches to cable needle and hold at the back of the work knit 3 stitches from the left needle and then knit 3 stitches from the cable needle k = knit k2tog = knit 2 stitches together 1 stitch decreased inc1 = using the backward loop method cast one stitch on the right needle 1 stitch increased p = purl p2tog = purl 2 stitches together 1 stitch decreased pm = place marker if you have any questions about this pattern s clarity or its sm = slip marker use please contact me via ravelry heather anderson designs ravelry name learnsomethingnew st s = stitch es 3 maine cables hat © 2019 heather anderson 4
